column6: Megan is a sweet miniature poodle who loves stashing acorns for the winter!
Ellie is a bit shy but still a total sweetheart. Her favorite hobby is looking for chipmunks
Chrissy loves sitting on laps and getting her tummy rubbed!
Killer of ducks. Grandpa-pa's mortal enemy. I only love Grandma-ma.
Part-time Santa Claus. Official security for the Lincolns. Loves running like a horse.
